results.title: A New vision
results.creator_credit: John Halas and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description: A short series of films about great artists which aims to entertain and excite audience attention as well as to inform, by blending computer animation and graphics, traditional animation and, where appropriate, live action with shots of the works under discussion.

results.title: A New supervisor takes a look at his job
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Problems in Supervision”.
A young worker has just been made a line supervisor; in an interview with the superintendent, he is told that in his new job he must learn to get results by working with people instead of with machines.

results.title: A New path
results.creator_credit: Verity Hollingworth, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: After realising that something was missing in her corporate job, Verity took a short term contract with Legacy and has been with them ever since. She talks about the care, diligence and passion of her fellow workmates and how working for Legacy has brought her closer to her own family and her family’s history.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Verity Hollingworth, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: A New look at the sun
results.brief_description: Describes the radioheliograph at the CSIRO Solar Observatory at Culgoora, near Narrabri, N.S.W. This large circular array of 96 antennae provides a unique instrument for observing brief solar surface disturbances.
results.description: Describes the radioheliograph at the CSIRO Solar Observatory at Culgoora, near Narrabri, N.S.W. This large circular array of 96 antennae provides a unique instrument for observing brief solar surface disturbances.

results.title: A New look at Leeuwenhoek's wee beasties (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Bruce J. Russell and Biomedia Associates
results.brief_description:
Episode of the Series “Inhabitants of the planet earth”
Examines free-living protists as viewed in natural time by differential interference cinemicrography. Discusses the classification and general characteristics of flagellates, amoebas, and ciliates.

results.title: A New dress (35 years of family sewing)
results.brief_description:
Bev Scott has been making clothes for her family for thirty years. To the sporadic background sound of a sewing machine, family members are interviewed showing their home-made clothes to describe the woman who created them.
Filmed by Malcolm McKinnon and featuring Bev Scott, Heather Scott, Robyn Ritchie, Erin Ritchie and Lauren Ritchie. Made in collaboration with Showcase Wangaratta.

results.title: A New Deal?
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Rich World Poor World”.
About 10000 people around the world die every day from lack of food. Are we really heading for global disaster? What can the world do to help itself? This and other questions about world poverty are discussed

results.title: A new day in Samoa
results.brief_description: The people of Western Samoa and their progress toward self-government. The pattern of village life, growing cash crops, Apia the capital and chief port, parades, Robert Louis Stevenson’s grave, building new churches, the work of health sisters, education, internal self government, New Zealand administration and economic assistance, the combination of British and Samoan tradition.
